identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Velvet Ledger' aesthetic that blends luxury with utility. Avoid generic SaaS looks.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Boutique Hotel warmth.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a concierge service.
Content is King: Data is the story, style is the narrator.
Zoom In: Focus on the micro-interactions of tracking.

usage.h1: font-heading text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tight text-primary
usage.h2: font-heading text-3xl md:text-4xl font-semibold tracking-tight text-primary/90
usage.label: font-body text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;700&display=swap');

semantic_usage.primary: Merlot Burgundy - Used for primary actions, active states, and key headers.
semantic_usage.secondary: Royal Violet - Used for data visualization accents and secondary actions.
semantic_usage.accent: Mauve Pink - Used for highlights, success states, and decorative elements.

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, floating action buttons, toast notifications.

grid_system.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

Card.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-card hover:shadow-hover transition-all duration-300

Button.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
Button.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium
Button.outline: border-2 border-primary/20 text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium

Input.base: bg-input/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary/30 focus:bg-background focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/10 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all

alcohol_tracker.usage: Hero image for Alcohol Tracker modal or background accent.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the extended colors (burgundy, violet) and fonts (Playfair Display, Manrope).
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' and set the base styles.
4. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, ALWAYS override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-full' to match the soft aesthetic.
5. LAYOUT: Build the Main Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid logic. Use the 'Card' component styles defined above.
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style the lines/bars with the 'violet' and 'accent' (pink) colors. Avoid default blues.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Pexels URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
8. AI INTEGRATION: Mock the Gemini API calls for now, but build the UI to display the 'Healthier Choice Y/N' and calorie analysis clearly.
9. CALENDAR: Create a custom view or use a library like 'react-big-calendar' styled to match the theme (no default blue headers).
10. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).

anti_patterns: No sharp 90-degree corners (unless intentional for brutalism - not here).
No dense, cluttered tables without breathing room.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast on the 'accent' (pink) background is sufficient (use dark text).
